EmailTemplate.name: 202012_Global_MSA_Email_Operational.Email 1 - Plain Text
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: MSA Hours due December 10
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Please note that all MSA hours must be submitted no later than December 10. You are receiving this reminder as you are responsible for one or more MSA contracts. Thank you in advance!
Honeywell Aerospace
